mapper.select: SELECT CR.CHATROOM_NO, CR.CHATROOM_ACTIVE, CR.WORK_STATUS, CR.MY_READ_STATUS, CR.YOUR_READ_STATUS, CR.MEM_ID, CR.MEM_ID2, C.CHAT_CONTENT FROM CHATROOM CR LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CHATROOM_NO, CHAT_CONTENT, CHAT_TIME FROM CHAT C1 WHERE C1.CHAT_TIME = ( SELECT MAX(C2.CHAT_TIME) FROM CHAT C2 WHERE C2.CHATROOM_NO = C1.CHATROOM_NO ) ) C ON CR.CHATROOM_NO = C.CHATROOM_NO WHERE CR.MEM_ID = #{loginUserId} OR CR.MEM_ID2 = #{loginUserId}
SELECT CHAT_NO chatNo, CHAT_TIME chatTime, CHAT_CONTENT chatContent, MEM_ID memId, CHATROOM_NO chatroomNo FROM CHAT WHERE CHATROOM_NO = #{chatroomNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT ( CHAT_NO, CHAT_TIME, CHAT_CONTENT, MEM_ID, CHATROOM_NO ) VALUES ( CHAT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, DEFAULT, #{message}, #{loginUserId}, #{chatroomNo} )
